version_name: 2.6Definition Pages:• New Back and Forward buttons
2.6Definition Pages:• New Back and Forward buttons
2.7: • Drag & Drop for iPad on iOS 11• Optimized UI and UX for iOS 11• Ready for iPhone XIf you have any questions or suggestions
2.7: • Drag & Drop for iPad on iOS 11• Optimized UI and UX for iOS 11• Ready for iPhone XIf you have any questions or suggestions

version_description:
感谢使用“极光词典”！本次更新恢复了选择和使用经典应用图标的选项。

2.7 版本：

• 现支持在运行 iOS 11 的 iPad 上进行拖放操作 (Drag & Drop)
• 为 iOS 11 优化的界面和交互
• 为 iPhone X 准备就绪

If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us by sending an email to lightscreen.app@

感谢使用“极光词典”！本次更新包括功能改进和问题修复。

• iPad：释义页的宽度会根据系统设置中设定的字体大小动态调整
• 解决了一个中文输入法的兼容性问题

If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us by sending an email to lightscreen.app@gmail.com
